content.value: public JsonObjectSerializer(StringBuilder buffer, Action? disposeNotifier = null)
Public Sub New(buffer As StringBuilder, disposeNotifier As Action = Nothing)

parameters.description: The buffer to write JSON to
An optional callback to be notified when disposed

children.remarks: These types are made public for third parties only for the purpose of serializing and deserializing messages that are sent across the process boundary (that is, types which implement ). Any other usage is not supported.
children.summary: A special-purpose streaming serializer for objects to JSON. Only supports a limited number of type (boolean, DateTimeOffset, decimal, Enum, int, long, string, and trait dictionaries).

content.value: public JsonArraySerializer SerializeArray(string key)
Public Function SerializeArray(key As String) As JsonArraySerializer

children.remarks: IMPORTANT: This serializer must be used completely and disposed before any other value is serialized into the object, or the serialization would be corrupted.

content.value: public JsonObjectSerializer SerializeObject(string key)
Public Function SerializeObject(key As String) As JsonObjectSerializer

children.remarks: IMPORTANT: This serializer must be used completely and disposed before any other value is serialized into the object, or the serialization would be corrupted.
children.summary: Start serializing an object into the object.

summary: A special-purpose streaming serializer for objects to JSON. Only supports a limited number of type (boolean, DateTimeOffset, decimal, Enum, int, long, string, and trait dictionaries).
remarks: These types are made public for third parties only for the purpose of serializing and deserializing messages that are sent across the process boundary (that is, types which implement ). Any other usage is not supported.

content.value: public sealed class JsonObjectSerializer : JsonSerializerBase, IDisposable
Public NotInheritable Class JsonObjectSerializer Inherits JsonSerializerBase Implements IDisposable
